```{r ex}
library(DALEX)
library(ceterisParibus)
library(randomForest)
library(localModel)
library(glmnet)

data('HR')
HR$evaluation <- as.factor(as.character(HR$evaluation))
mrf <- randomForest(status ~., data = HR, ntree = 100)

explainer <- explain(mrf, 
                     HR,
                     HR$status,
                     predict_function = function(x, y)
                       as.data.frame(predict(x, y, type = "prob")))

observation <- HR[10, ]
size <- 1000

model_lok <- individual_surrogate_model(explainer, observation, 2000, n_points = 100,
                                        response_family = "gaussian")
plot(model_lok)
```
